subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: how to transcribe air and ear
msgSnippet: The problem is that there is no *single* mapping possible, unless you wish to enforce people s pronunciation. You ll have to expect variation, or the whole
messageBody:
The problem is that there is no *single* mapping
possible, unless you wish to enforce people's
pronunciation.
You'll have to expect variation, or the whole point
of a phonetic alphabet (corresponding to the spoken
word) will be lost.

> >I cannot see any good argument against a mapping of
> QS to IPA.
>
> I didn't say don't.


===========
Never insult anyone by accident.
- Robert A. Heinlein
